post.body:
Now Quake 4 on Steam - 19.99$. Publisher: Bethesda Softworks (no Activision on start logo, credits etc... ).

Purchase before August 8th at 10AM PDT and receive "The Original" Quake Rocket Launcher for the Soldier in Team Fortress 2!
